styles.name: GHOST CARTRIDGE
styles.desc: Haunted NES cartridge. Glitchy, corrupted pixels. Color palette: sickly greens (#3d5a45, #8bac0f), deep purples, CRT phosphor glow. Scanlines mandatory. Text flickers. Random pixel artifacts. Dithered shadows. Everything slightly wrong - misaligned sprites, color bleeding. Mono font only.

styles.name: COZY CABIN
styles.desc: Stardew Valley meets Animal Crossing. Warm, rounded UI with soft shadows. Palette: warm cream (#faf6e9), terracotta, sage green, dusty rose. Subtle paper textures. Friendly hand-drawn icon style. Gentle bounce animations. Feels like a warm blanket. Accessible, inviting, wholesome.

styles.name: NEON DOJO
styles.desc: Neo-Geo cabinet at 2am. Hot neon on pure black. Electric pink (#ff2d95), laser cyan (#00f0ff), warning yellow. Aggressive angles, diagonal stripes. Chrome/metallic accents. Big bold Impact-style fonts. Health bars, VS screens. Everything screams INSERT COIN.

styles.name: PAPER DUNGEON
styles.desc: Sketchbook brought to life. Off-white parchment background (#f5f0e6). Hand-drawn wobbly borders. Ink splatter accents. Muted palette: sepia, faded red, dusty blue. Crosshatch shading patterns. Fantasy map aesthetic. Torn paper edges. Candle-flicker animations.

styles.name: VOID PROTOCOL
styles.desc: Alien computer terminal circa 2087. Pure black void with single accent: blood orange (#ff4d00) OR cold cyan. Monospace everything. Minimalist brutalist layouts. Thin 1px lines. Data streams, loading bars, system diagnostics aesthetic. Glitch text. Unsettling negative space.

styles.name: BUBBLEGUM ARCADE
styles.desc: Japanese UFO catcher aesthetic. Pastel explosion: bubblegum pink (#ff99cc), mint (#99ffcc), lilac (#cc99ff), lemon (#ffff99). Chunky rounded shapes, puffy 3D buttons. Stars and hearts everywhere. Bouncy spring animations. Thick black outlines. Sparkle particles.

styles.name: TERMINAL NOIR
styles.desc: 1980s mainframe meets film noir. Green phosphor text (#33ff33) on pure black. Matrix rain optional. Monospace Courier only. Blinking cursors. ASCII art borders. Fake command prompts. Amber (#ffaa00) for warnings. No graphics - everything is text. Feels like hacking.

styles.name: SUNSET BOULEVARD
styles.desc: Driving into a sunset forever. Gradient skies: orange to purple to pink. Chrome text with horizontal lines. Palm tree silhouettes. Grid floor to horizon. Lens flare mandatory. Hot magenta (#ff1493), electric orange (#ff6b00). Speed lines. Retrofuture optimism.

styles.name: MOSS & RUIN
styles.desc: Overgrown post-apocalypse but peaceful. Muted forest greens (#4a5d4a, #6b7b5f), concrete gray, rust orange accents. Vines creeping over UI. Cracked textures. Soft dappled light. Rounded organic shapes. Weathered serif fonts. No sharp corners. Nature won.

styles.name: SUGAR RUSH
styles.desc: Dopamine factory. Bright saturated primaries: red, yellow, blue, green. White background. Fat chunky shapes. Huge touch targets. Confetti explosions on every action. Star bursts, +1 floating up. Progress bars everywhere. Big dumb fun. No reading required.
